I

io.atomix.copycat - package io.atomix.copycat
Core Copycat APIs, including CopycatClient and CopycatReplica.

io.atomix.copycat.coordination - package io.atomix.copycat.coordination
Provides distributed coordination resources such as DistributedLock and DistributedLeaderElection and DistributedTopic for publish-subscribe messaging.
